item.title: EvilNick add a quote by Joseph Heller
item.description: "I'll tell you what justice is. Justice is a knee in the gut from the floor on the chin at night sneaky with a knife brought up down on the magazine of a battleship sandbagged underhanded in the dark without a word of warning" -- Joseph Heller

item.title: EvilNick add a quote by Joseph Heller
item.description: "You know, that might be the answer – to act boastfully about something we ought to be ashamed of. That’s a trick that never seems to fail.” --Colonel Korn, Catch-22" -- Joseph Heller

item.title: EvilNick add a quote by Joseph Heller
item.description: "They're trying to kill me," Yossarian told him calmly. No one's trying to kill you," Clevinger cried. Then why are they shooting at me?" Yossarian asked. They're shooting at everyone," Clevinger answered. "They're trying to kill everyone." And what difference does that make?" -- Joseph Heller

item.title: EvilNick add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Sometimes lies were more dependable than the truth." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: EvilNick add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams
